name: Spaghetti Quest (Pedro Game Dev)
description:
A game by Team Glitch Happens:

  • Programming by Sergio Martinez 

    https://twitter.com/anidealgift

  • Art by Pablo Andrés 

    https://www.instagram.com/hellopabloandres

  • Voices by Paolo Vicenzi 

    https://instagram.com/paolo.vicenzi

  • Design by Pedro Fuentes 

    https://twitter.com/PedroGameDev

Spaghetti Quest is a game created for Ludum Dare 47. 

Here's the Ludum Dare entry page!

To play the Ludum Dare Jam version, please click here : JAM VERSION

Thank you for playing!

Special thanks goes to Diego Ruiz (localization support) and Kevin Sardà.
